description: CloudStackCluster is the Schema for the cloudstackclusters API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: CloudStackClusterSpec defines the desired state of CloudStackCluster.

host.description: The hostname on which the API server is serving.

port.description: The port on which the API server is serving.

identityRef.description:
CloudStackIdentityReference is a reference to an infrastructure
provider identity to be used to provision cluster resources.

kind.description:
Kind of the identity. Must be supported by the infrastructure provider
and may be either cluster or namespace-scoped.

name.description: Name of the infrastructure identity to be used.

network.description: The network within the Zone to use.

id.description: Cloudstack Network ID the cluster is built in.

name.description: Cloudstack Network Name the cluster is built in.

type.description: Cloudstack Network Type the cluster is built in.

status.description: The actual cluster state reported by CloudStack.

domainID.description: Cloudstack Domain ID the cluster is built in.

failureDomains.description:
CAPI recognizes failure domains as a method to spread machines.
CAPC sets failure domains to indicate functioning Zones.

additionalProperties.description:
FailureDomainSpec is the Schema for Cluster API failure domains.
It allows controllers to understand how many failure domains a cluster can optionally span across.

attributes.description: attributes is a free form map of attributes an infrastructure provider might use or require.

controlPlane.description: controlPlane determines if this failure domain is suitable for use by control plane machines.

loadBalancerRuleID.description: The ID of the lb rule used to assign VMs to the lb.

publicIPID.description: The CS public IP ID to use for the k8s endpoint.

publicIPNetworkID.description: The ID of the network the PublicIP is in.

ready.description: Reflects the readiness of the CS cluster.

zones.description: The status of the cluster's ACS Zones.

network.description: The network within the Zone to use.

id.description: Cloudstack Network ID the cluster is built in.

name.description: Cloudstack Network Name the cluster is built in.

type.description: Cloudstack Network Type the cluster is built in.
